title: ERROR:Solve the problem of python nltk punkt not found
content:
• Click to Switch to English/Chinese

Error content:

Lookuperror:
*******************************************************************************
  Resource Punkt Not Found.
  Please use the nlfk downloader to obtain the resource:

  >>> Import nltk
  >>> nltk.download ('Punkt')

  For more information see: https://www.nltk.org/data.html

  Attempted to load tokenizers/punkt/English.pickle

  Searched in:
    -'C: \\ Users \\ xxx/nltk_data'
    -'C: \\ python3.11 \\ nltk_data'
    -'C: \\ python3.11 \\ share \\ nltk_data'
    -'C: \\ python3.11 \\ lib \\ nltk_data'
    -'C: \\ Users \\ xxx \\ appdata \\ rooming \\ nltk_data'
    -'C: \\ nltk_data'
    -'D: \\ nltk_data'
    -'E: \\ nltk_data'
    -''
*******************************************************************************

Solution:

-1 github up download the punkt.zip file

https://github.com/nltk/nltk_data/blob/gh-packages/tokenizers/punkt.zip

-2 Unzip the punkt.zip file to one of the folders in the following directory (just one can be created if there is no directory)

-'C: \\ Users \\ xxx/nltk_data'
-'C: \\ python3.11 \\ nltk_data'
-'C: \\ python3.11 \\ share \\ nltk_data'
-'C: \\ python3.11 \\ lib \\ nltk_data'
-'C: \\ Users \\ xxx \\ appdata \\ rooming \\ nltk_data'
-'C: \\ nltk_data'
-'D: \\ nltk_data'
-'E: \\ nltk_data'
-''

-3 Enter the Python terminal and enter the following two sections of code
import nltk
nltk.download (‘Punkt’)

-4 Seeing the return result is as follows, it proves that the import is successful

[nltk_data] Download Package Punkt to
[NLTK_DATA] C: \ python3.11 \ lib \ nltk_data ...
[nltk_data] unzipping tokenizers \ punkt.zip.
True

-5 Return to the program you wrote and continue to run
text: Click to Switch to English/Chinese Error content: Lookuperror: ***********************************************************************...
